description: Too many times compromises are made to make a shoe light and fast—not the Katabatic Mid Waterproof. It has the hallmarks of a light and fast shoe with all the features of a true hiker: support, stability, protection, and performance. The highly breathable waterproof Katabatic Mid is engineered to move fast on the trail and built for wet weather.
name: Oboz Katabatic Mid B-Dry - Mens

specs.value: Abrasion-Resistant Breathable Mesh, B-DRY Waterproof Membrane, Reinforced TPU Overlays welded & stitched to reduce weight, and provide protection & durability
Proprietary lightweight & high rebound single density EVA, ESS Plate | underfoot protection & tuned stiffness
